title: [GAMEPLAY] Omega Squad Twitch Missing Interaction
body: Omega Squad Twitch doesn't have his lines whenever he hits a Caitlyn trap. I noticed it the first time I played against a Caitlyn, and I haven't heard it trigger once anytime, even purposefully stepping on traps each time to see if it shows up. They are just gone.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! In the future, this wouldn't be considered gameplay, as it doesn't directly hinder your ability to play the game. :) We can take a look at this today and see what's going on.

Then you should update the stickied thread it doesn't give us other options besides tagging it as gameplay: 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug

>In the title, briefly describe the bug and tag it as either [GAMEPLAY], [CLIENT], or [CRASH]

Hi KateyKhaos,

i have also noticed that he is missing some voice lines after popping out of stealth: The "Hiiiii" "It's meeeee!" and so on!
Hi hi! Thanks for the heads up - lemme poke around and see what's going on with the VO.
